column2: [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] Gives Military Advice

§Y$CLAIMANT$§! can use this Casus Belli to seize all titles held by the infidel, §Y$TARGET$§!, within the de jure §Y$TITLE$§!. This Casus Belli is valid against neighbors, and also against infidels up to two sea zones away.
column3: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! peut utiliser ce casus belli pour s'emparer de tous les titres que possède l'infidèle §Y$TARGET$§! au sein de §Y$TITLE$§! de jure. Ce casus belli est valide contre des pays frontaliers, mais aussi jusqu'à deux zones maritimes de distance si l'attaquant ou le défenseur est un musulman, ou encore si l'ère des grandes guerres saintes a commencé pour la religion de l'attaquant.
column4: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! kann diesen Kriegsgrund dazu benutzen, dem ungläubigen Ziel §Y$TARGET$§! sämtliche Titel unter dem De-jure-Titel §Y$TITLE$§! abzunehmen.
column6: §Y$CLAIMANT$§! puede utilizar este casus belli para apoderarse de todos los títulos que posee el infiel, §Y$TARGET$§!, dentro de los de jure §Y$TITLE$§!. Este Casus Belli es válido contra vecinos, y también contra los infieles hasta a dos marítimas de distancia, si el defensor o el atacante es un musulmán, o si la época de la Gran guerra santa ha comenzado por la religión del atacante.

column2: Champion of the Estelar

column2: My servants apparently lost track of [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] today, and it took hours to locate [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim]! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] was found in the nick of time, just before I was about to order a full-scale search. When they found [child_of_destiny.GetHerHim] [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] was reading a book no one had ever seen before, written in lorass no less...
column3: Mes serviteurs ont apparemment perdu la trace de [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] aujourd'hui et cela a pris des heures pour [child_of_destiny.GetLeLa] retrouver, juste à temps avant que j'ordonne une recherche à grande échelle. [child_of_destiny.GetIlElleCap] lisait un livre que personne n'avait jamais vu auparavant, écrit en latin.
column4: Meine Diener haben heute scheinbar [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] verloren und es hat Stunden gedauert [child_of_destiny.Getihnsie] ausfindig zu machen! [child_of_destiny.GetSheHeCap] wurde gerade rechtzeitig gefunden, kurz bevor ich eine umfassende Suche anordnen wollte. Als sie [child_of_destiny.Getihnsie] fanden, las [child_of_destiny.GetSheHe] ein Buch, das zuvor noch niemand gesehen hat, geschrieben in Latein...
column6: ¡Al parecer, hoy mis sirvientes perdieron la pista de [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName] y les llevó horas localizarlo! Solo lo hallaron en el último instante, cuando estaba a punto de organizar una batida general. Al encontrarlo, estaba leyendo un libro que nadie había visto, y encima en latín…

column2: [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], oh how you scared me...! And how do you know Loross?
column3: [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], vous m'avez fait très peur ! ... Et comment connaissez-vous le latin ?
column4: [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName], ich habe mir solche Sorgen gemacht! Und woher kannst du Latein?
column6: ¡Qué susto me has dado, [child_of_destiny.GetFirstName]! ¿Desde cuándo sabes latín?

column2: The key fits the lock, and trembling with anticipation you slowly open the chest. It is filled with ancient gold coins, carved with the likeness of the long-dead Emperors of Netheril and words written in their strange language!
column3: La clef entre dans la serrure et, tremblant d'excitation, vous ouvrez lentement le coffre. Il est rempli d'anciennes piËces d'or gravÈes d'un seau similaire ‡ celui des empereurs romains morts depuis des lustres et de mots Ècrits dans leur langue Ètrange†!
column4: Der Schl¸ssel passt perfekt ins Schloss und zitternd vor Erwartung ˆffnet Ihr langsam die Truhe. Sie ist mit uralten Goldm¸nzen gef¸llt, die das Antlitz l‰ngst verstorbener, rˆmischer Imperatoren eingepr‰gt haben sowie Worte in ihrer fremden Sprache.
column6: La llave encaja en la cerradura, y temblando de emociÛn abres el cofre poco a poco. °Est· lleno de antiguas monedas de oro, talladas con la imagen de los Emperadores de Roma muertos hace mucho tiempo y palabras escritas en su extraÒo idioma!

column2: As your men return from looting the holding, one of them hands you an unlocked chest with a faint arcane aura. Whatever is inside, must be magical.
I can't wait to see what's inside!
No, leave it.
As you finally unlock the chest, an arcane aura fills the air. Whatever is inside, must be magical.
I can't wait to see what it is!
As you finally unlock the chest, you feel a shiver down your spine. Suddenly, the chest opens on its own, springing into action and sporting rows of sharp teeth!
Have at thee, creature!
Aaaagh! Mimic!
Mundane Armor
I'm more skilled than a succubus!
I'm more skilled than a succubus!

The guests have arrived, and the time has come for the blot to begin! You gather outside the temple, and start by offering animals as sacrifice to the gods. While their meat is prepared for the feast that is to follow, the blood is sprinkled on altars of the gods, as well as on the worshipers themselves.
Now for the human sacrifice...
column3: Et maintenant, le sacrifice humain...
column4: Und jetzt zum Menschenopfer...
column6: Ahora, para el sacrificio humano...

column2: The time has come for the blot held by [From.GetTitledFirstName] to begin! You gather outside the temple, and start by offering animals as sacrifice to the gods. While their meat is prepared for the feast that is to follow, the blood is sprinkled on altars of the gods, as well as on the worshipers themselves.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] is brought up from your dungeons and escorted to the temple. As the noose is placed around [From.GetHerHis] neck, [From.GetSheHe] steadies [From.GetHerselfHimself] and murmurs several passages that you recognize as being from an Estelar holy book.

column2: The council becomes §Ymalcontent§!.\n

While scouring the silk road market in [chinese_silk_road_target.GetName] your scouts came across a Shou traveler. This traveler, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], claims to be a traveling surgeon-poet of renowned skill - a claim the scouts were unable to verify. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] offers to join your court in return for adequate compensation.
column3: Alors qu'ils longeaient la route de la soie, vos éclaireurs ont rencontré un voyageur chinois à [chinese_silk_road_target.GetName]. [recruited_physician_target.GetIlElleCap] se nomme [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] et déclare être un chirurgien-poète aux habiletés réputées – une affirmation que les éclaireurs furent incapables de vérifier. [recruited_physician_target.GetIlElleCap] propose de rejoindre votre Cour en échange d'une compensation adéquate.
column4: Auf einem Markt an der Seidenstraße in [chinese_silk_road_target.GetName] entdeckten Eure Kundschafter eine reisende Person aus China namens [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] gab an, ein reisender Chirurgenpoet zu sein, doch Eure Kundschafter konnten den Wahrheitsgehalt dieser Aussage nicht bestätigen. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] würde sich gegen angemessene Entschädigung gerne an Eurem Hof verdingen.
column6: Mientras registraban un mercado de la Ruta de la seda en [chinese_silk_road_target.GetName], tus exploradores se encontraron un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] viajer[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] chin[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] de nombre [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], que afirma ser un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] cirujan[recruited_physician_target.GetOA]-poeta errante de fama reconocida, una afirmación que los exploradores no pudieron confirmar. [recruited_physician_target.GetElEllaCap] se ofrece a unirse a tu corte por una compensación adecuada.

column2: A surgeon-poet is just what I need!
column3: Un chirurgien-poète est justement ce dont j'ai besoin !
column4: Poesie und Chirurgie sind genau das, was ich brauche!
column6: ¡Cirugía y poesía, justo lo que necesito!

column2: News reaches you of a traveling Zakharan scholar who just arrived on a ship in the harbor of [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]. The scholar, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName], is rumored to be working on a compendium of medical treatments - this likely makes [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] a willing candidate for the position of physician, as [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] would be able to continue [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] work at your court!
column3: Des nouvelles font état d'un érudit arabe à bord d'un navire qui vient juste d'amarrer dans le port de [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]. L'érudit, nommé [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName], serait en train de travailler sur un recueil des traitements médicinaux, ce qui en fait un candidat prêt pour le poste de physicien, puisqu'[recruited_physician_target.GetIlElle] serait capable de continuer son travail à votre Cour.
column4: Ihr erhaltet Berichte über eine[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] reisende[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] arabische[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] Gelehrte[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] namens [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName]. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] ist gerade mit einem Schiff im Hafen von [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName] angekommen und soll an einem Kompendium über medizinische Behandlungsweisen arbeiten. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] würde sich also vermutlich ideal für die Stelle des Hofarztes eignen und könnte an Eurem Hof weiter am Kompendium arbeiten!
column6: Te llegan noticas de un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] sabi[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] árabe de viaje que acaba de llegar en barco al puerto de [arab_scholar_trade_post_target.GetName]. De est[recruited_physician_target.GetEA] sabi[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] de nombre [recruited_physician_target.GetFullName] se rumorea que trabaja en un compendio de tratamientos médicos. Esto le haría interesarse en el puesto de médico, pues podría continuar su trabajo en tu corte!

column2: Bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to me!
column3: Amenez-[recruited_physician_target.GetLeLa] à moi !
column4: Willkommen an meinem Hof!
column6: ¡Traed[recruited_physician_target.GetRleRla] ante mí!

column2: You are told that there resides a Untheric doctor in a small, nearby, village. The doctor, known in learned circles as [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], is rumored to possess rare medical texts! Such a learned [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] would surely be an asset to your court.
column3: Vous apprenez qu'un[recruited_physician_target.Get_E] docteur réside dans un village des alentours. [recruited_physician_target.GetLeLaCap] docteur, connu[recruited_physician_target.Get_E] dans les milieux savants, s'appelle [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]. Il est dit qu'[recruited_physician_target.GetIlElle] possède des textes de l'école réputée de Gondishapur ! Une telle érudition serait sans doute bénéfique à votre Cour.
column4: Ihr erhaltet Berichte über eine[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] Mazdan-Doktor[recruited_physician_target.GetinFemale] namens [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] in einem kleinen Dorf in der Nähe. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] soll im Besitz von Schriften der berühmten Akademie von Gundischapur sein! Solch eine gebildete Person würde sich an Eurem Hof als sehr nützlich erweisen.
column6: Te cuentan que en un pueblecito cercano vive un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] médico mazdeísta. ¡De est[recruited_physician_target.GetEA] médico, conocid[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] en los círculos académicos como [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], se rumorea que posee textos de la famosa escuela de Gondishapur! Un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] [recruited_physician_target.GetManWoman] tan erudit[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] sería una gran baza en la corte.

column2: A good candidate, pay [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] and bring [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] to court!
column3: Un bon candidat. Payez-[recruited_physician_target.GetLeLa] et amenez-[recruited_physician_target.GetLeLa] à la Cour !
column4: Ausgezeichnet, bezahlt [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] und bringt [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] an meinen Hof!
column6: Un buen candidato, ¡pagad[recruited_physician_target.GetRleRla] and traed[recruited_physician_target.GetRleRla] a la corte!

column2: Your scouts tell of a foreign missionary that just arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The missionary, named [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], has returned after a long mission to far-away Shou Lung. The locals say [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] knows many remedies, knowledge [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe]'s picked up during [recruited_physician_target.GetHersHis] travels. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] would certainly be a worthy addition to your court!
column3: Vos éclaireurs vous rapportent qu'un[recruited_physician_target.Get_E] missionnaire nestorie[recruited_physician_target.GetNNne] se trouve à [Root.Capital.GetName]. [recruited_physician_target.GetIlElleCap] se nomme [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] et vient de revenir d'une longue mission à la lointaine Cathay. Les habitants disent qu'[recruited_physician_target.GetIlElle] connaît de nombreux remèdes, qu'[recruited_physician_target.GetIlElle] les a appris durant ses voyages. [recruited_physician_target.GetIlElleCap] serait certainement un atout pour votre Cour !
column4: Eure Kundschafter berichten über eine[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] nestorianische[recruited_physician_target.GetnMale] Missionar[recruited_physician_target.GetinFemale] namens [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], [recruited_physician_target.Getderdie] gerade in [Root.Capital.GetName] eingetroffen ist, nachdem [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] sich auf einer langen Missionsreise im fernen China befand. Laut der Bevölkerung kennt [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] viele Heilmethoden, die [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] sich auf Reisen angeeignet hat. [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHeCap] wäre zweifelsohne eine Bereicherung für Euren Hof!
column6: Tus exploradores te hablan de un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] misioner[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] nestorian[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] que acaba de llegar a [Root.Capital.GetName]. [recruited_physician_target.GetElLaCap] misioner[recruited_physician_target.GetOA], de nombre [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName], ha regresado tras una larga misión a la lejana Catay. La gente de la zona dice que conoce muchos remedios, conocimientos que adquirió durante sus viajes. [recruited_physician_target.GetElEllaCap] sería una incorporación bienvenida a tu corte!

column2: Bring this missionary to court!
column3: Amenez ce missionnaire à la Cour !
column4: Bringt diese Person an meinen Hof!
column6: ¡Traed al misioner[recruited_physician_target.GetOA] la corte!

column2: A silk road merchant recently arrived in [Root.Capital.GetName]. Your guards report that, under the guise of providing free medical examinations, this '[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]' had used the opportunity to preach the Adama religion! The guards locked [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] up for [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHis] own good, but perhaps [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] could work as your physician?
column3: Un marchand de la route de soie est récemment arrivé à [Root.Capital.GetName]. Vos gardes rapportent que, sous prétexte de fournir des examens médicaux gratuits, ce « [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] » a prêché l'évangile de Mani ! Les gardes l'ont enfermé pour son propre bien, mais peut-être pourrait-[recruited_physician_target.GetIlElle] être votre physicien ?
column4: [recruited_physician_target.GetEinEine] Händler[recruited_physician_target.GetinFemale] der Seidenstraße ist vor Kurzem in [Root.Capital.GetName] eingetroffen. Eure Wachen berichten, dass [recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName] kostenlose medizinische Untersuchungen anbot, diese Gelegenheit jedoch dazu nutzte, die Lehren Manis zu verbreiten! Die Wachen sperrten [recruited_physician_target.GetHerHim] zum eigenen Schutz ein, doch vielleicht könnte [recruited_physician_target.GetSheHe] an Eurem Hof als Heiler[recruited_physician_target.GetinFemale] arbeiten?
column6: Un[recruited_physician_target.GetXA] mercader de la Ruta de la seda llegó recientemente a [Root.Capital.GetName]. Tus guardias te informan que con la excusa de proporcionar exámenes médicos gratuitos, est[recruited_physician_target.GetEA] '[recruited_physician_target.GetFirstName]' aprovechaba la oportunidad para predicar el Evangelio de Mani! Los guardias [recruited_physician_target.GetLoLa] encerraron por su propio bien, ¿pero quizás podría servirte como médico?
